hadiths.text: Hakim bin Hizam said:"I bought some food and made food and made a profit on it (by selling it) before I took possession of it. I came to the Messenger of Allah and told him about that and he said: 'Do not sell it until you take possession of it

chapter.ara-name: باب بَيْعِ الطَّعَامِ قَبْلَ أَنْ يُسْتَوْفَى
chapter.eng-name: Selling food before taking possession of it
